description: Prometheus fountain, partially in shadow; water flowing from pipes and overflowing two levels to pool; wall behind fountain has illegible inscription with includes the words ART in the top line, and MEANS and TO in the second; shadows on wall of water and Prometheus

title: Prometheus, Fountain at Rockefeller Center
